channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report I-2025030050
item.description:
Report I-2025030050

Identified by scraper @ 2025-04-15T00:53:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-19
  • City: Reno
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: SOUTHWEST AIRLINES CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 1
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: SWAA Flight 3077arrived and was parked at the RNO airport gate. While deplaning passengers, a laptop battery belonging to a passenger sitting in seat 15D went into thermal runaway. The cabin began to fill with smoke and Flight Attendants moved the passengers away from the event. Those passengers forward of the incident were told to continue exiting through the front door, while those aft of the in^cident were told to exit outof the aft door and down the evacuation slide.
